text: The 2015 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 17th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2015 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !!
